bean.p:headerText: @{#textHelper.getFormattedMessage('bookmarks.widget.headerWithCount', new Object[]{(lookupResults eq null or lookupResults.size() eq 0) ? '0' : lookupResults.size()})}

bean.p:render: @{#line.courseDetailsWrapper.scheduledTerms.size() gt 0 ? false : #line.courseDetailsWrapper.lastOffered ne null ? true : false}
